API Collection# SceneKit Error Codes

## [Discussion](/documentation/SceneKit/1409723-scenekit-error-codes#Discussion)

Constants for the [`code`](/documentation/Foundation/NSError/code) property of [`NSError`](/documentation/Foundation/NSError) objects produced by the SceneKit framework.

## [Topics](/documentation/SceneKit/1409723-scenekit-error-codes#topics)

### [Constants](/documentation/SceneKit/1409723-scenekit-error-codes#Constants)

[`var SCNProgramCompilationError: Int`](/documentation/scenekit/scnprogramcompilationerror)An error in compiling GLSL shader source code for use with the [`SCNProgram`](/documentation/scenekit/scnprogram) class.## [See Also](/documentation/SceneKit/1409723-scenekit-error-codes#see-also)

### [Handling Shader Compilation Errors](/documentation/SceneKit/1409723-scenekit-error-codes#Handling-Shader-Compilation-Errors)

[`func program(SCNProgram, handleError: any Error)`](/documentation/scenekit/scnprogramdelegate/program(_:handleerror:))Tells the delegate that an error occurred when compiling GLSL source code.[`let SCNErrorDomain: String`](/documentation/scenekit/scnerrordomain)Identifies an error type defined by the SceneKit framework.
